availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Covington, Kenton County, KY. A Kentucky-born attorney. Born in Fayette County, KY, son of James W. Dudley and Mary "Polly" Ferguson.

bibl.p: Ancestry.com, Family Tree of username mthoward91, https://www.ancestry.com/family-tree/person/tree/15263568/person/260022892126/facts (accessed 27 May 2017).

Ancestry.com. Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1964 [database on-line]. Lehi, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2007, Death certificate of M.J. Dudley, Microfilm 7012973, Certificate # 557, Covington, Kenton County, KY, 23 Sep 1888.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 24.
